1562074727_191qyhaRxXEx1bdtG65iQvFddtXBj.body:
First ask permission [with this command](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DocsYf2tZVVMEMJFHiDsppmFicZCWkVv1/site_development/zeroframe_api_reference/#plugin-cors)

And then you can use the `as` command for database queries on that site [with this command](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DocsYf2tZVVMEMJFHiDsppmFicZCWkVv1/site_development/zeroframe_api_reference/#as) as well as access resources on the site by prefixing the address with "cors-" like http://127.0.0.1:43110/cors-1DocsYf2tZVVMEMJFHiDsppmFicZCWkVv1/favicon.ico
